name: Train Trouble
description:
Train Trouble is a small puzzle game based on the Trolley Problem made in 3 days.

There is a Train in constant movement and you can redirect it in a way that it doesn't hit the people that have been trapped on the tracks.


Controls:

Movement: WASD

Speed Up The Train: Spacebar

Interact: E


All assets were made by me, except the font

font used: https://www.dafont.com/smallest-pixel-7.font
